body: Holy shit, this manhwa is amazing. The art is fucking beautiful. The Mc actually develops, from a weak, bread shuttle to an chad, ladykiller, alpha. The red haired guy fucked everyone but by the chapter 300+, it was the MC time. He stole and fucked all the girls, the bully has been with. He's stealing all of them without the bully's knowing lmao. That's chad for you.
What is the manhwa title? Can somebody tell me pls? So i can search for the english version cause i can't read mandarin
不知不觉都100话了。。后期剧情太过瘾了
